= **[[size 2.3em]]Dance of the Jailers[[/size]]**
@@@@
@@@@
= **[[size 1.5em]]Mobile Task Force-CN Artwork Collection[[/size]]**
@@@@
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/collab:drstse/mtfs.jpg]]
----
@@@@
@@@@
[[f<image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/collab:drstse/stse2021.jpg width="150" height="150" ]]

> As you can see, here is a collection of five artworks that I have done in about one year, from 2022 to the present, in all of which MTF-CN stars as the main character, and five main characters were cropped and combined to form a picture. Happy viewing, my friend.
> @@@@
> @@@@
> @@@@
